title: Includes member of school athletics department or physical education department on committee on special ed, requires committee to determine level of participation in programs
summary: Includes member of school athletics department or physical education department on committee on special ed, requires committee to determine level of participation in school athletic programs permitted for student with a handicapping condition; directs that no eligibility requirements shall bar a student's participation in an athletic program/activity if the committee on special ed determines particpation is permissible.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to adding a member of the school athletics department or physical education department onto the committee on special education, and requiring such committee to determine the level of participation in school athletic programs permitted for a student with a handicapping condition
